attribute.name: Purchase Description
attribute.value:
ARC AML Brands: Balon, CSC, Frontier, Grove, GVS, KF, Meridian, Nutron, PBV, Velan, WKM, Worcester, GWC, Williams, Warren, C&C Enflow -Only acceptable for trunnion mounted valves JAG Only acceptable in the 'Internal spring loaded valves 1/2" and 3/4" spring loaded valves for sight glasses.
Body Material: A182-F316/316L
Minimum spec noted on description and material are a minimum requirement. Equivalent or better is acceptable upon client approval
Conditions: 1. All threaded end valves to be minimum 3000 psig rating with 2 or 3 piece threaded body construction (preferred). Bolted body is an acceptable alternative. 2. All SW end valves shall be minimum 3000 psig rating with 3 piece bolted body construction. 3. NPS 2 and above shall be bolted body construction. 4. All valves to have locking device/handles. 5. Soft seated valves shall be firesafe to API 607. 6. In Gas critical service DBB to be used. 7. In liquid critical service DIB1or DIB2 with some exceptions.

attribute.name: Description

ARC AML Brands: Balon, CSC, Frontier, Grove, GVS, KF, Meridian, Nutron, PBV, Velan, WKM, Worcester, GWC, Williams, Warren, C&C Enflow -Only acceptable for trunnion mounted valves JAG Only acceptable in the 'Internal spring loaded valves 1/2" and 3/4" spring loaded valves for sight glasses.
Body Material: A182-F316/316L
Minimum spec noted on description and material are a minimum requirement. Equivalent or better is acceptable upon client approval
Conditions: 1. All threaded end valves to be minimum 3000 psig rating with 2 or 3 piece threaded body construction (preferred). Bolted body is an acceptable alternative. 2. All SW end valves shall be minimum 3000 psig rating with 3 piece bolted body construction. 3. NPS 2 and above shall be bolted body construction. 4. All valves to have locking device/handles. 5. Soft seated valves shall be firesafe to API 607. 6. In Gas critical service DBB to be used. 7. In liquid critical service DIB1or DIB2 with some exceptions.
